resources.string: Exposure
The account is not allowed to register more devices
The account has maximum allowed sessions
Device body is missing or the device ID is not found
JSON received is not valid JSON
Underlying CRM does not accept the given credentials
The business unit can not be found
Session token is missing
Session token was provided but not valid
The asset was not found
User is not entitled to play this asset
The user device is not allowed to play the asset
The user is in a country that is not allowed to play the asset
Asset exists but is expired
Media is registered but is not enabled for streaming
User has reached the total limit on downloaded assets across devices
This asset has been downloaded the maximum number of times by this user
Asset downloaded and may not be streamed
This user is not allowed to download this asset
The maximum number of concurrent stream limit is reached
The media is not available in a format that can be played on this device
Request forbidden
Connection refused
Unknown error
Network communication error
